Uses of Package
gwt.g2d.client.graphics

Packages that use gwt.g2d.client.graphics
gwt.g2d.client.framework Contains an abstract application framework. 
gwt.g2d.client.graphics Contains the framework for manipulating canvas using 2D context. 
gwt.g2d.client.graphics.canvas Contains the wrapper for those JavaScriptObjects related to Canvas and it 2D context. 
gwt.g2d.client.graphics.shapes Contains a framework for building shapes. 
gwt.g2d.client.graphics.visitor Contains visitor classes that aids the shape building process. 
gwt.g3d.client.text Contains helper classes for rendering text. 
 

Classes in gwt.g2d.client.graphics used by gwt.g2d.client.framework
Surface
          The surface that an application uses to render to the screen.
 

Classes in gwt.g2d.client.graphics used by gwt.g2d.client.graphics
Color
          Stores a color.
ColorStop
          A color stop in a gradient.
Composition
          Determines how shapes and images are drawn onto the existing bitmap.
DirectShapeRenderer
          Interface for manipulating the Surface's path drawing directly.
Gradient
          Represents a gradient which can be used for fill style or stroke style.
ImageLoader.CallBack
          Interface to allow anonymous instantiation of a CallBack Object with method that gets invoked when all the images are loaded.
KnownColor
          Contains a set of known colors.
LineCap
          Defines the type of endings that UAs will place on the end of lines.
LineJoin
           Defines the type of corners that UAs will place where two lines meet.
PatternRepetition
          Determines the repetition mode of a pattern.
Surface
          The surface that an application uses to render to the screen.
TextAlign
          Determines the text alignment settings.
TextBaseline
          Determines the text baseline alignment settings.
TextMeasurer
          Helper class for measure the size of a text in pixels.
